p:
The total carbon stock from various carbon pools was calculated by aggregating the carbon stock densities of the individual carbon pools using the equation given by Subedi et al. (2010). The total carbon stock is then converted to tons of CO 2 equivalent by multiplying it by 44/12, or 3.67 ( Pearson et al., 2007).
(11)TC = AGC + BGC + DWCS + SOC
